about_the_game:
Background Story


The world is waiting for you to save it, but all you want to do is lazy. Due to you just won a billion dollars and were suddenly summoned to another world. Who has the motivation to become a hero when you could just live a carefree life?

Unfortunately, the gods had other plans. They threw you directly into this new world, promising that if you help solve their “a little” troubles, they’ll let you return home or enjoy wealth and prosperity here.

To survive without worries, you must diligently complete the tasks assigned by the gods.

Demo Content

In the demo, you can experience card battles and event gameplay
However, there is no save and load mechanism, so you can only play to the end in one go.
Fortunately, this edition doesn’t have a lot of content, so it shouldn’t be a problem.

Enjoy the game and if you encounter any problems or have any ideas, please feel free to give feedback to the developers!
